## CannotModifyGitConnectedStore class

Error thrown when attempting to modify a store that is connected to a Git repository.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CannotModifyGitConnectedStore extends NotOK 
```
**Extends:** [NotOK](./core.notok.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `CannotModifyGitConnectedStore` class.
